a.detail: A narrow shaft descends from the corridor into a midden chamber below
a.summary: A narrow shaft descends from the corridor into a midden chamber below

c.detail: A 5-foot wide chasm cuts across the corridor
c.summary: A 5-foot wide chasm cuts across the corridor

i.detail:
Magic Missle Trap: DC 15 to find, DC 20 to disable;
    one target, 1d10 force damage

m.detail: A fountain of water sits in an alcove here
m.summary: A fountain of water sits in an alcove here

n.detail: A metallic odor fills the corridor
n.summary: A metallic odor fills the corridor

r.detail: Several alcoves are cut into the walls here
r.summary: Several alcoves are cut into the walls here

s.detail: The walls here have been engraved with endless spirals
s.summary: The walls here have been engraved with endless spirals

u.detail: A rotting odor fills the corridor
u.summary: A rotting odor fills the corridor

w.detail:
Rune of Paralyzation: DC 20 to find, DC 10 to disable;
    affects all targets within 10 ft., DC 10 save or become paralyzed for 1d4 rounds

x.detail:
Ice Dart Trap: DC 10 to find, DC 15 to disable;
    +6 to hit against one target, 2d10 cold damage

z.detail: The walls here have been engraved with geometric patterns
z.summary: The walls here have been engraved with geometric patterns

details.history: The dungeon was created by a lich as a tomb. It was eventually conquered by invaders, and has lain empty for many centuries until recently.
details.illumination: Average (shadowy in corridors, lamps or torches in most rooms)

east.desc: Secret (DC 15 to find) Stuck Simple Wooden Door (DC 10 to break; 10 hp)
east.secret: A bookcase and concealed door pivots smoothly

north.desc: Stuck Good Wooden Door (DC 15 to break; 15 hp)

south.desc: Stuck Iron Door (DC 25 to break; 60 hp)

monster: Wraith (cr 5, mm 302) and 1 x Specter (cr 1, mm 279); deadly, 2000 xp
detail.room_features: A sloped pit lined with iron spikes lies in the east side of the room, and a rusted breastplate lies in the south-east corner of the room

east.desc: Stuck Simple Wooden Door (DC 10 to break; 10 hp)

south.desc: Stuck Stone Door (DC 20 to break; 60 hp)

west.desc: Locked Strong Wooden Door (DC 10 to open, DC 20 to break; 20 hp)

detail.room_features: Spirals of blue stones cover the floor, and a pair of dice lies in the south-west corner of the room

west.secret: The door is concealed behind a statue of an armored warrior, and opened by moving his sword

detail.room_features: Someone has scrawled "silver, white" on the north wall, and the scent of urine fills the south side of the room

monster: Wraith (cr 5, mm 302) and 1 x Specter (cr 1, mm 279); deadly, 2000 xp
detail.room_features: Someone has scrawled "Good spot for ambush" in goblin runes on the east wall, and a pile of shattered weapons lies in the south side of the room

    affects all targets within 10 ft., DC 11 save or become paralyzed for 1d4 rounds

Contact Poison: DC 10 to find, DC 10 to disable;
    affects each creature which touches the trigger, DC 15 save or take 2d10 damage

detail.room_features: Various torture devices are scattered throughout the room, and a pile of spoiled meat lies in the south-east corner of the room

west.desc: Stuck Strong Wooden Door (DC 15 to break; 20 hp)

monster: Orog (cr 2, mm 247) and 1 x Orc (cr 1/2, mm 246); easy, 550 xp

Falling Block: DC 10 to find, DC 10 to disable;
    affects all targets within a 10 ft. square area, DC 14 save or take 2d10 damage

west.secret: The door is concealed behind a statue of a demonic sorceress, and opened by moving her hand

Net Trap: DC 10 to find, DC 10 to disable;
    affects all targets within a 10 ft. square area, DC 11 save or become restrained

detail.room_features: A group of demonic faces have been carved into the north wall, and the north and west walls are covered with cracks

north.secret: The door is concealed behind a tapestry of ghoulish carnage

detail.room_features: A simple fireplace sits against the east wall, and a pile of rotten fruit lies in the south-west corner of the room

detail.room_features: A narrow ledge runs along the north and west walls, and sporadic knocking can be faintly heard near the north wall

hidden_treasure: Hidden (DC 15 to find) Locked Simple Wooden Chest (DC 25 to unlock, DC 15 to break; 10 hp)

1400 cp, 1200 sp, 60 gp, a bone coffer engraved with a labyrinth (25 gp), a brass torc etched with arcane runes (25 gp), a pewter miniature (of a castle) adorned with chrysoberyl (25 gp), an agateware tile painted with a renowned coat of arms (25 gp), Spell Scroll (Stone Shape) (rare, dmg 200), Potion of Superior Healing (rare, dmg 187)

wandering_monsters.1: Troll (cr 5, mm 291) and 1 x Ogre (cr 2, mm 237); deadly, 2250 xp, wandering senselessly
wandering_monsters.2: 2 x Mimic (cr 2, mm 220); medium, 900 xp, trying to lure the party into an ambush
wandering_monsters.3: Roper (cr 5, mm 261) and 2 x Piercer (cr 1/2, mm 252); deadly, 2000 xp, wielding bizarre eldritch powers
wandering_monsters.4: Bandit Captain (cr 2, mm 344) and 2 x Bandit (cr 1/8, mm 343); easy, 500 xp, actively patrolling their territory
wandering_monsters.5: Orog (cr 2, mm 247) and 1 x Ettin (cr 4, mm 132); deadly, 1550 xp, lost and desperate
wandering_monsters.6: 2 x Ogre Zombie (cr 2, mm 316); medium, 900 xp, scavenging for food and treasure
